event.title: developed as a mill town during the Industrial Revolution, but has today

data.event: It developed as a mill town during the Industrial Revolution, but has today lost much of its industry and is characterised by pockets of severe deprivation and some of the lowest house prices in the country.
The forest of Pendle was made famous by the Pendle witch trials of 1612.

event.title: accused in the less well-known witch trails of 1634

data.event: One of the accused in the less well-known witch trails of 1634, Margaret Johnson, confessed that she first met her familiar in Marsden.
